snippet.title: The Timeless Child: Prologue - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Timeless Child: Prologue is a 2-player cooperative first-person puzzle game. You will embark in an emotional journey to save the little Emily from her temporal imprisonment discovering the story and the mysteries of the Wells family through time and space travels.

Download now for free: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1792010/The_Timeless_Child__Prologue/

Follow us!
Website: https://www.timeless-tale.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/timelesstale...
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/timelesstal...
Discord: https://discord.gg/fTHewE3vrM

Trailer editing by: Riccardo Chioetto
Trailer music by: Francesco Picco 
Trailer SFX by: Luigi Forcina
Voice Actor: Francesco Picco
